ygData.subject: The raider
ygData.msgSnippet: All around him, the comet s halo blazed and trailed off into the void. That mattered not. What did was the navigation informations his core computer fed him.

All around him, the comet's halo blazed and trailed off into the void.
That=
 mattered not. What did was the navigation informations his core
computer f=
ed him.

Computer: Approaching Vector Earth. Entering orbit in 10 cycles.

=
???: Override. I don't want to get to Earth... yet. Modify entry
trajectory=
 for this orbit.

Computer: Acknowledged... 

The comet moved fast. Soon th=
e time for take off arrived.

Computer: Coming into range of desired orbit.=
 Please launch in 5, 4,
3, 2, 1, launch.

He lit up boosters and left the c=
omet's surface. He was hurled into
space at ludicrous speed, but then stabi=
lized. He used his thrusters
and  aimed for his destination... the Moon.

C=
omputer: Entering estimated radar coverage range. Recommand reactor
output =
decrease.

???: Abort. The plan is the hit hard and fast. All energy requir=
ed.
Set that in the parameters.

Computer: Understood. Good luck.

That's i=
t, huh? he thought, no one else but that stuck up PCU to wish
me luck... Wi=
th any chance, they'll thank me after that... Minions,
here I am!
